purpleculture_pinyin:
yáo
distant; remote; far; far away
далекий; удаленный; далеко; далеко
purpleculture_info:
(Simplified: 遥)
Pictophonetic: 䍃 indicates the sound; 辶 (walk) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
遙遠 [ yáo yuǎn ]: distant; remote
遙感 [ yáo gǎn ]: remote sensing
遙望 [ yáo wàng ]: to look into the distance
遙控 [ yáo kòng ]: remote control
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿺ Surround from lower left
    • 辶 [ chuò ] to walk; walking
    • 䍃 [ yóu ] vase, pitcher, earthenware
heisig_chinese_memo: Driving down a remote road is dangerous, so bring some canned meat in case you break down.
Ru_trainchinese: yáo: (графема) далекий, отдаленный (в пространстве или времени)
Kanshudo_mnemonic: you vibrate (䍃) and move (辶) far away
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: On the long long road through the remote desert, far off you can see a condor flying...
humanum_full_description_en:
From "辵", "䍃" sound. The original meaning is distance. "Shuowen": "Remote, happy. It's also far away. Congruo, Diansheng." "Dialect": "Remote, wide, far away. Liang Chu said far away." Such as "Book of Rites. Wang Zhi: "From the East River to the East China Sea, thousands of miles away." "Selected Works. Wang Zhongxuan's "Fu of Denglou": "Looking forward from the distance with the Xuan threshold, opening my breast to the north wind."

" Remote " means long and long time. For example, Liang Jiangyan of the Southern Dynasty: "The day is far away but not twilight, and the night is always in the sky." Ouyangxiu of the Northern Song Dynasty (and the moon in the palace on August 15): "The house is silent in the heart, and the autumn city is far away at night. "

" Remote " also means wandering. Such as "The Songs of the Chu. Chapter Nine. "Big Move": "The soul is back, there is nothing far away." Wang Yi's note: "Remote, still drifting away, letting out the appearance." Tao Yuanming of the Eastern Jin Dynasty "Returning Words": "The boat is far away with light, wind is blowing Floating and blowing clothes."

"Xiaoyao" is a continuous word that describes the appearance of walking slowly, and is extended to mean peace and ease. Such as "Zhuangzi. "Let the King": "Work at sunrise, breathe in the sun, enjoy the leisure and contentment of the world." "Selected Works. "Pan Anren's "Xianju Fu"": "Building a house and planting trees, happy and comfortable." See " Xiao ".
humanum_short_description_en: From "辵", "䍃" sound. The original meaning is distance.
humanum_full_description:
從「辵」，「䍃」聲。本義是距離遠。《說文》：「遙，逍遙也。又遠也。从辵，䍃聲。」《方言》：「遙、廣，遠也。梁楚曰遙。」如《禮記．王制》：「自東河至於東海，千里而遙。」《文選．王仲宣〈登樓賦〉》：「憑軒檻以遙望兮，向北風而開襟。」

　　「遙」引申表示時間上的長、久。如南朝梁江淹〈青苔賦〉：「晝遙遙而不暮，夜永永以空長。」北宋歐陽修〈和八月十五日齋宮對月〉：「齋館心方寂，秋城夜已遙。」

　　「遙」亦表示飄蕩。如《楚辭．九章．大招》：「魂魄歸徠，無遠遙只。」王逸注：「遙，猶漂遙，放流貌也。」東晉陶淵明〈歸去來兮辭〉：「舟遙遙以輕颺，風飄飄而吹衣。」

　　「逍遙」是連綿詞，形容緩步行走貌，又引申為安閑自在。如《莊子．讓王》：「日出而作，日入而息，逍遙於天地之閒而心意自得。」《文選．潘安仁〈閑居賦〉》：「築室種樹，逍遙自得。」參見「逍」。
humanum_short_description: 從「辵」，「䍃」聲。本義是距離遠。
_purpleculture_dictionary_orig_full:
遙 (Simplified: 遥)
Pinyin: yáo
English Definition: distant; remote; far; far away
Total strokes: 14; Radical: 辵
Pictophonetic: 䍃 indicates the sound; 辶 (walk) conveys the meaning.
Character Formation:
  • ⿺ Surround from lower left
    • 辶 [ chuò ] to walk; walking
    • 䍃 [ yóu ] vase, pitcher, earthenware
Example Words:

遙感 [ yáo gǎn ]: remote sensing
遙望 [ yáo wàng ]: to look into the distance
遙控 [ yáo kòng ]: remote control

yáo
同“遥”。

“遥1”的旧字形。

遙字的康熙字典解释

【酉集下】【辵字部】　遙； 康熙笔画：17； 页码：页1262第25
〔古文〕?【廣韻】【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?餘招切，音謠。【說文】遠也。【禮·王制】千里而遙。【左傳·昭二十五年】遠哉遙遙。　又逍遙，徜徉也。互詳逍字註。
